name: Ext_R5_ValueSet_co_in_fi_op
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ValueSet.compose.include.filter.op for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ValueSet.compose.include.filter.op from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ValueSet|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: = | is-a | descendent-of | is-not-a | regex | in | not-in | generalizes | child-of | descendent-leaf | exists
element.definition: The kind of operation to perform as a part of the filter criteria.
element.comment: `ValueSet.compose.include.filter.op` maps to R4B `ValueSet.compose.include.filter.op`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: = | is-a | descendent-of | is-not-a | regex | in | not-in | generalizes | child-of | descendent-leaf | exists
element.definition: The kind of operation to perform as a part of the filter criteria.
element.comment: `ValueSet.compose.include.filter.op` maps to R4B `ValueSet.compose.include.filter.op`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: The kind of operation to perform as a part of a property based filter.
